# INDeleteTasksIntentResponse

**Class**

Your response to a request to delete tasks.

## Declaration

```swift
class INDeleteTasksIntentResponse
```

## Overview

Use an [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INDeleteTasksIntentResponse] object to return information about your attempt to delete an existing task. Siri communicates the information from your response to the user at appropriate times.

You create an [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INDeleteTasksIntentResponse] object in the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INDeleteTasksIntentHandling/confirm(intent:completion:)] and [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INDeleteTasksIntentHandling/handle(intent:completion:)] methods of your handler object. For more information about implementing your handler object, see [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INDeleteTasksIntentHandling].

## Initializing the Response Object

- **init(code:userActivity:)**: Initializes the response object with the specified code and user activity object.

## Accessing the Deleted Tasks

- **deletedTasks**: An array of tasks to delete.

## Getting the Response Code

- **code**: The code that indicates whether you successfully handled the intent.
- **INDeleteTasksIntentResponseCode**: Constants that indicate the response state.

## Task Deletion

- **INDeleteTasksIntentHandling**: An interface that handles requests to delete tasks from a task list.
- **INDeleteTasksIntent**: A request to delete one or more tasks.
- **INDeleteTasksTaskListResolutionResult**: A resolution result for deleting task lists.
- **INDeleteTasksTaskResolutionResult**: A resolution result for deleting tasks.

## Inherits From

- INIntentResponse

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCoding
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
- NSSecureCoding
